headline: Will D.R. Horton’s (DHI) Bet on AI Mortgage Tech Redefine Its Competitive Edge?
summary: In the past week, D.R. Horton took part in a US$22 million Series A funding round for Tidalwave, an AI-powered mortgage platform designed to streamline the home financing process. This move underlines D.R. Horton's commitment to technology investments that could improve both operations and customer experience, even as housing market headwinds persist. We'll explore how this focus on AI-powered mortgage innovation may impact D.R. Horton's long-term growth strategy and competitive...
